title: 关闭炼油厂
author: 隐者皓元
txt_content:
我们学生都是弱势群体，即使知道了PX项目的真相，也只有像个**一样装作什么也不知道，只能为政府说假话 说屁话 说好话，当政府的走狗。我们昆明人给政府好吃好住，但政府却反来毒害我们昆明人。不要脸 不要脸 不要脸 不要脸
是昆明人的都转发一下file:///C:/DOCUME~1/ADMINI~1/LOCALS~1/Temp/8W$B734YIZY4@@Z]EW]MQ52.giffile:///C:/DOCUME~1/ADMINI~1/LOCALS~1/Temp/8W$B734YIZY4@@Z]EW]MQ52.giffile:///C:/DOCUME~1/ADMINI~1/LOCALS~1/Temp/8W$B734YIZY4@@Z]EW]MQ52.giffile:///C:/DOCUME~1/ADMINI~1/LOCALS~1/Temp/8W$B734YIZY4@@Z]EW]MQ52.giffile:///C:/DOCUME~1/ADMINI~1/LOCALS~1/Temp/8W$B734YIZY4@@Z]EW]MQ52.giffile:///C:/DOCUME~1/ADMINI~1/LOCALS~1/Temp/8W$B734YIZY4@@Z]EW]MQ52.giffile:///C:/DOCUME~1/ADMINI~1/LOCALS~1/Temp/8W$B734YIZY4@@Z]EW]MQ52.giffile:///C:/DOCUME~1/ADMINI~1/LOCALS~1/Temp/8W$B734YIZY4@@Z]EW]MQ52.giffile:///C:/DOCUME~1/ADMINI~1/LOCALS~1/Temp/8W$B734YIZY4@@Z]EW]MQ52.giffile:///C:/DOCUME~1/ADMINI~1/LOCALS~1/Temp/8W$B734YIZY4@@Z]EW]MQ52.giffile:///C:/DOCUME~1/ADMINI~1/LOCALS~1/Temp/8W$B734YIZY4@@Z]EW]MQ52.giffile:///C:/DOCUME~1/ADMINI~1/LOCALS~1/Temp/8W$B734YIZY4@@Z]EW]MQ52.giffile:///C:/DOCUME~1/ADMINI~1/LOCALS~1/Temp/8W$B734YIZY4@@Z]EW]MQ52.giffile:///C:/DOCUME~1/ADMINI~1/LOCALS~1/Temp/8W$B734YIZY4@@Z]EW]MQ52.giffile:///C:/DOCUME~1/ADMINI~1/LOCALS~1/Temp/8W$B734YIZY4@@Z]EW]MQ52.giffile:///C:/DOCUME~1/ADMINI~1/LOCALS~1/Temp/8W$B734YIZY4@@Z]EW]MQ52.giffile:///C:/DOCUME~1/ADMINI~1/LOCALS~1/Temp/8W$B734YIZY4@@Z]EW]MQ52.giffile:///C:/DOCUME~1/ADMINI~1/LOCALS~1/Temp/8W$B734YIZY4@@Z]EW]MQ52.giffile:///C:/DOCUME~1/ADMINI~1/LOCALS~1/Temp/8W$B734YIZY4@@Z]EW]MQ52.giffile:///C:/DOCUME~1/ADMINI~1/LOCALS~1/Temp/8W$B734YIZY4@@Z]EW]MQ52.giffile:///C:/DOCUME~1/ADMINI~1/LOCALS~1/Temp/8W$B734YIZY4@@Z]EW]MQ52.giffile:///C:/DOCUME~1/ADMINI~1/LOCALS~1/Temp/8W$B734YIZY4@@Z]EW]MQ52.giffile:///C:/DOCUME~1/ADMINI~1/LOCALS~1/Temp/8W$B734YIZY4@@Z]EW]MQ52.giffile:///C:/DOCUME~1/ADMINI~1/LOCALS~1/Temp/8W$B734YIZY4@@Z]EW]MQ52.giffile:///C:/DOCUME~1/ADMINI~1/LOCALS~1/Temp/8W$B734YIZY4@@Z]EW]MQ52.giffile:///C:/DOCUME~1/ADMINI~1/LOCALS~1/Temp/8W$B734YIZY4@@Z]EW]MQ52.giffile:///C:/DOCUME~1/ADMINI~1/LOCALS~1/Temp/8W$B734YIZY4@@Z]EW]MQ52.giffile:///C:/DOCUME~1/ADMINI~1/LOCALS~1/Temp/8W$B734YIZY4@@Z]EW]MQ52.giffile:///C:/DOCUME~1/ADMINI~1/L
